statements: DELETE FROM GreenhouseGasEmissions WHERE emission_amount > 500 AND measurement_unit = 'kg/m^2';
DELETE FROM emissions_records WHERE source_id = 2 AND record_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM emissions_records WHERE record_date = '2022-01-01' AND source_id = 1;
DELETE FROM greenhouse_gas_sources WHERE source_name = 'Factory ABC' AND location = 'City XYZ';
DELETE FROM greenhouse_sources WHERE source_name = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM greenhouse_sources WHERE emission_type = 'GHG' AND emission_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM EmissionSources WHERE source_name = 'Fossil Fuel';
DELETE FROM Source_Categories WHERE source_id = 2 AND category_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Source_Categories WHERE source_id = 10 AND category_id = 3;
